title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.159 - Flexibility
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.159 - Flexibility

State Regulations

Each pipeline must be designed with enough flexibility to
prevent thermal expansion or contraction from causing excessive stresses in the
pipe or components, excessive bending or unusual loads at joints, or
undesirable forces or moments at points of connection to equipment, or at
anchorage or guide points. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
255.159

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
